ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 51
ygData.msgSnippet: I gather, then, that BS can be cast on OTHERS??  not just ourselves? And please explain the bonus after level 20? From:	 Farr, Robert
ygData.messageBody:
I gather, then, that BS can be cast on OTHERS?? not just ourselves?


And please explain the 'bonus' after level 20?




From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...> on 05/20/99 12:01 PM
PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 51

From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

It doesn't make a difference to YOU, as you are a non-melee type
class. It
WILL however, make a difference to 20+ level melee types who start
getting
damage bonuses for high str after level 20. Remember, the enchanter
is a
group class, not a solo class...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: FryyGuyy [SMTP:FryyGuyy@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 1:56 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 51
>
> From: FryyGuyy <FryyGuyy@...>
>
> Well i finally got both halfs of page 30 to research my berserker
spell.
> Researched it and walla i succeeded. Only to find out that it does
not do
> what the book and all the web pages say wich is add STR and AGI.
Instead
> it gives me 20 STR and takes away 10 Agility ?? What the hells up
with
> that a buff that takes away something. I've made several different
warrior
> classes experimenting with the different
> stats and #1 althought STR does help i find it far less importent
than dex
> or agility, I'de never trade 20 str for -10 agility. #2 its not
even a
> trade off of 20 STR for -10 AGI ....Instead i can just use lvl 1
STR spell
> add 10 STR to whoever now the only difference between that and
this new
> big bad Berserker STR spell is 10 STR and loosing 10 agility !!!
What
> kinda damn spell is that...
>

the

least used

Wizard

like
> Fear.

BALANCE... they

and know
> what

FIX it
> >

blur on

stomped youa

am

> > >> blues, totally. Risky or dangerous, doesn't seem to matter.
> > >>
> > >> Memory Blur is what I would deem a get out of Jail free card.
It is a
> > >> second chance basically. Against Non Agressive beasts, it is
a
> do-over.
> > >> It stops them in their tracks, and makes em forget. It
doesn't freeze
> > >> them like mez does. But, my big use for it was saving a
beach full
> of

giant,

> > >> goes the Memory Blur, bingo! Instantly make 20 new friends =)

other

you are in

green
> > creature. So the trade off is that our spells can affect
creatures of
> any
> > kind. The problem is that most of the magic-users get an
extremely good
> MR
> > due to spells. Another problem is the fact that our damage
spells dont
> do
> > any damage when resisted. Right now, our spells are almost never
> resisted by
> > greens, rarely by blues, rarely by whites ( although I could not
cast a
> > single spell on Dorn when he was white to me ), sometimes
resisted by
> > yellows, resisted 20-30% of the time by the reds that are one
level
> above
> > yellows and resisted 100% by all other reds.
> > Here is my list of suggestions:
> > 1) Damage spells should at least do some damage when resisted
following
> > similar rules as the wizard spells with a lesser ratio maybe to
keep a
> > balance with those easy-to-kill wizards,
> > 2) Our spells should not jump from a 20-30% resistance to a full
100%
> > resistance, there should be a nicer ramp so that an enchanter is
not

> target.
